entry.title: About us
entry.content:
who we are

Audio & Speech Research Group is a research group under the Key Laboratory of Noise and Vibration Research, Institute of Acoustics, Chinese Academy of Sciences. The Principal Investigator of this research group is Prof. Feiran Yang (杨飞然). Our research interests include Adaptive Filtering, Blind Source Separation, Array Signal Processing, Voice Anti-Spoofing, Acoustic Echo Cancellation, Speech Enhancement. See in here

The members of group includes Feiran Yang (杨飞然), Yi Wan (万伊), Taihui Wang (王泰辉), Shengdong Liu (刘升东), Zhengqiang Luo (罗正强), Yang Liu (刘杨), Jinfu Wang (王劲夫), Changtao Li (李长涛), Jing Lei (雷菁), Kelan Kuang (匡柯澜), Qing Shi(石擎), Lan Tang (汤澜), Cong Zhang(张聪), Haobo Jia (贾浩博)
